interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Fuck Christmas " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " There is Nothing " .

progression.synopsis: Kirin and Ayane have a conversation — if Kirin walked in on Ayane and Sensei during the beach vacation, she makes Ayane unhappy by talking about it; otherwise, they have a more friendly conversation about Sensei, Christmas, and feeling appreciated. Meanwhile, Sensei asks Ami and Maya who he drew for Secret Santa — both of them say that they don't know, and are unimpressed with his attempts to designate his pocket change as a gift. Looking for a real present, he meets Molly , who has an idea for what to do. She gets him to buy an empty bottle.
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on if Sensei saw Prisoner

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.11.
